name: RoboTails
description:
Welcome to RoboTails, a game where you are trapped in the lair of the MEGA VILLAIN ROBOCORP.  Your objective, to find your way out and defeat him. 

Controls: 

A: Move Left
D: Move Right
Space: Jump (IMPORTANT, you have to release the space bar to jump)
Shift (Left or Right):  Leave a Robot behind
R: Reset Level
Mouse Scroll To change the colors of the robots

This game was made for the Games Job Live Fall Game Jam 2021.

The theme was Leave Something Behind

The time limit was 1 Week.

This was a solo project.
